Welcome to Blockchain-Simulator’s documentation!¶

Blockchain-Simulator is a python package for simulate the interaction between miners and the impact of their behavior during the mining process. In this simulator, a number of policy functions are set by default, which the agents act on. In addition, the simulator can receive different policy functions from the input and evaluate its efficiency. The simulation community can also be changed according to your needs.

Check out the Usage section for further information, including how to install the project.

Note

This project is under active development.
